data.message:
Your profile has just won $85,000.00 in the Facebook! 2014End of Year Lottery Draws. To claim your prize, please you would be required to contact the Payment Desk with this email details below for more directives:

Contact person Mr. Harry Carl
Remittance Officer. Facebook Lottery Promotions
E-mail:  harrycarl194@gmail.com

Just introduce yourself to him and also send him your Facebook user name and wining ticket number 0000276564954 for easy verifications of your file Congratulations from Facebook board!

Regards
Brianna Benga.

replies.message: Hey Paul. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/205730929485170. -Hailey
